records.title: Mini Valet
details: Cleaning of all windows inside and out.
Application of quick detailer / body shine.

records.title: Full Valet
details: Cleaning of all windows inside and out.
Paint protection with hard wax (protection up to 6 months).

records.title: Full Valet +
details: Cleaning of all windows inside and out.
Paint protection with polymer coating (protection up to 12 months).

records.title: Standard Wash
details: Thorough exterior wash, pre-wash of wheels and insects, drying of the body, tire shine, application of hydro wax.

records.title: Premium Wash
details: Thorough exterior wash (two-bucket method), cleaning of door frames, wheel cleaning with ferrous contaminant remover, tire shine, drying of the body, application of hydro wax.

records.title: Detailed Wash
details: Thorough exterior wash (two-bucket method) with brushing, cleaning of door frames, wheel cleaning with ferrous contaminant remover, removal of iron and tar particles from the body, tire shine, drying of the body, application of liquid wax.

records.title: Quick Detailer
details: Quick enhancement of body shine. Restores shine and depth of color.

records.title: Hard Wax Body Protection for up to 6 Months
Polymer Coating
details: Body protection with polymer coating for up to 12 months.

records.title: 3-Year Ceramic Coating
details: Paint correction and protection with Ulcoat One + Hydro HD coating.

records.title: 4-Year Ceramic Coating
details: Paint correction and protection with Aqua Graphene Coating.

records.title: 5-Year Ceramic Coating
details: Paint correction and protection with Ultracoat Premium Bond 9h coating.

records.title: Removal of Limescale from Body and Windows
details: Restoration of smoothness and clarity of paint and windows by removing limescale deposits using safe methods.

records.title: Body Decontamination
details: Cleaning of paint from contaminants, restoring smoothness and shine.

records.title: Complete Ceramic ( Unlocking ) Coating Service
details: Full maintenance of ceramic coating, restoring its hydrophobic and protective properties.

records.title: Basic Upholstery Cleaning
details: Includes cleaning of seats, rear seat, and door panels for a 5-seat car.

records.title: Floor Cleaning
details: Floor cleaning without removing the seats.

records.title: Floor Mat Cleaning
details: Cleaning of the car floor mats.

records.title: Leather Upholstery Cleaning
details: Cleaning leather seats, door panels, steering wheel, headrests, and gear stick with special products and a leather brush.
